name: retype
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to write something again using a keyboard: Retype the Web address in your browser rather than clicking on links. He found the letters and re-typed them, then submitted them for publication.
More examplesFewer examplesMy email provider required me to retype my password, and then told me that my account was temporarily disabled.Now click in the Retype Password box and retype your password.With the arrival of word processors, pages of text no longer had to be retyped to correct simple errors.
